SUB_W15_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
That odor... Perhaps due to the
smoke rising from those buildings?

SUB_W15_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
The atmosphere here is
positively dreary.

SUB_W15_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Was that the Vermillion Bird!? ...No.
Merely a trick of light and smoke.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Another accident? Well, great. I suppose this
is going to postpone the beginning of service
yet again. What is our useless pack of engineers
even doing!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You there! What are you staring into
space for? Hurry up and deal with this!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I'll see it taken care of, Director.
I've already called Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
There's going to be no end to trouble if you
don't sort this out, Fred. Dealing with the
Anti-Triangle is already enough of a headache—
we don't need more issues in our lives.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And remember this: the Trigon Corporation
has no seats at the table for those who prove
themselves of no use.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sorry about that, friend. The director's been
on edge lately, what with the accidents at
the triangle engines and the appearance
of the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ah, I see. You've clearly come to
us from somewhere far away.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well then, let me give you the rundown.
Every single machine we have is powered
by something called a 'triangle engine.' These engines are based on a concept
called 'triangle theory,' and require
no fuel of any kind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Matters of technology do not concern
the Dismal King, but I suspect it is all
quite important to you people.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Yes, it is. Moving on, the term 'Anti-Triangle'
is a general word we use to describe the
fiends that have started to crop up of late
near our triangle engines. Our current working theory is that these fiends
are attracted to the force fields that surround
the engines, but honestly, the phenomenon isn't
particularly well understood yet.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Fiends are creatures that dwell in the dark.
Your triangle engines must be suffused with
darkness that in some way compels them.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
A fascinating theory! Are you a scholar?
I'm sure she'd be interested to—

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
I hear we had another accident
with the triangle engines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Oh, Corana! Great. Now that you're here,
I'll let you sort the situation out.
Work with this fellow here to repair the
triangle engines, please and thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
All right. Come on, you—we'll start by
making some emergency repairs to the
central terminal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: BX10_EX

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Emergency repairs are finished.
Things should function without
issue once more after we restore
the entire triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
As the new model of triangle engine
is rather lacking in countermeasures,
sudden loads tend to cause accidents. Also, I've yelled at the Trigon board about
this until I'm blue in the face, but do
they listen to me? Nooo!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Thanks, though I guess yelling about it
to you isn't going to do me any good. It's just that the director never listens
to a word I say, telling Fred is pointless,
and you just happen to be standing here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
There is no time for idle chatter.
We must proceed to the next location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Of course, Master. We'll head to the
triangle engine at the tower at once.
Come along, you!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Is that fiend one of the
Anti-Triangle you spoke of?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You don't know about the Anti-Triangle?
Are you a new hire or something?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I am no new hire.
I am the Dismal King. I came to your world but a short time ago.
You and your fellows seemed most interesting
to me, so I began my observation.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh. Sorry about that; I thought you
were a Trigon Corporation employee.
Still, that doesn't explain why Fred
had you come along.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I could not say; that man also
knew of my far-flung origins.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
But let us stay our chatter a moment.
There are fiends to dispatch.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_000.text:
System reinitialization is complete,
and the restart process is underway.
We should return to normal output shortly.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Did the fiends damage
your triangle engine?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_020.text:
The Anti-Triangle doesn't attack the triangle
engines—it just steals energy from them.
But eventually it steals so much that
the engines overload and shut down.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_030.text:
Usually I can't count on a word Fred says,
but it looks like he wasn't wrong about my
bringing you along.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_040.text:
Since all the other triangle engines are
currently in shutdown mode, I need to
go around and restart them all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_050.text:
I'd normally have to wait until Trigon sent out
a special team to deal with the Anti-Triangle,
but with you and Master at my side, we should
be able to proceed without issue.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_060.text:
In other words, you wish for me
to exterminate fiends. Very well.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_070.text: Boy, you sure took that in stride.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_080.text:
You and your fellows have piqued my interest,
as have your triangle engines. Do not answer
this interest with disappointment.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Can't say I love how you phrased that
or what it implies, but I'll just shut up
and take the help.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_100.text:
A fine plan. Now let us head to the next site;
as soon as we have three repaired engines,
we can link them into a more efficient
tandem known as a 'triangle network.'

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_010_110.text:
Mmm. Then we have but to form a triangle.
With the terminal and the tower, we need
only repair one more engine in a location
that completes the shape.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There is little of note in this cave.
Is there a triangle engine here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Not according to the data I have on hand.
That said, the place is indeed part of
the triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Welcome to Mural Ruins. I'm Barbara;
I conduct research on the murals here.
And my, aren't you unusual guests!
Are you really Dr. Sitrix's assistant?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The Dismal King assists no one.
Now tell me the nature of these ruins.
Look deep into the eyes and respond!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Yes... This is where Alessa and Corana—
the Sitrix sisters—invented triangle theory.
Supposedly they were inspired by the murals,
but many things about that are not yet clear.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
In spite of those things, I hope to unravel
the true meaning behind the murals by
investigating the various pieces that remain
here. I... Hm? What just happened?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I would also like to see the mural
that Dr. Corana Sitrix saw.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I was created by Dr. Alessa Sitrix based
upon the principles of triangle theory.
I know nothing of the time prior to my
initial origination.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh dear. You see, that mural is located
deep inside the cave, and I am not sure
I can actually guide you there. You'll probably want to consult with Corana;
it's a complicated route, but I'm sure BX10
won't have any trouble recalling it once
she implants it in his memory.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I wish to see the place where triangle theory
was born. The reason behind this is something
more akin to human sentimentality than logic,
but either way, I feel the need to go there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_000_CUT_000_120.text: Then let us to the laboratory.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
We heard of the mural you discovered which
allowed you to concoct your triangle theory.
I demand to know its location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
There are more than a few factual inaccuracies
there, but I'll let that go for now. More to the
point, however, you can't visit the mural.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
It turned into the Vermillion Bird and flew away.
That event was the impetus for our research into
triangle theory, which posits that arrays of
triangles can produce energy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
I exist because doctors Corana and Alessa Sitrix
went into that cave, and would like to see it for
myself so I might decide whether or not it is a
truly special place.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Will you fulfill the wishes
of this robot, scientist?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Very well. In that case, I will record
the location data in Master's memory
so he can guide you there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Were you able to get directions
from Dr. Sitrix?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yes. Lead the way, robot. Will you be coming, woman? As a researcher
of the cave murals, you could hardly afford
to let such an opportunity pass you by.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Just take care not to
get lost along the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
The mural is gone, just as the doctor said.
Disappointing, is it not?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Something's off with me. I should
be disappointed that I can't see the
mural, but...I don't seem to care.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text: There is a triangular indentation here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Ah, and a triangular fragment
there on the ground.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text: Then there is but one logical course.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Though faint, I am detecting energy. 
This is a triangle engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Oh, but this raises so many questions!
Did this occur naturally, or did ancient
people already know about triangle theory!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Does this place also use
a triangle engine?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The dam's hydraulic power generation
is used to make the triangle engine
more efficient. It is one of Dr. Alessa Sitrix's earliest
works—such a large-scale apparatus
would not be made today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
A'yup. And since it's so old,
maintenance is a real pain.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
While the procedure to restart this engine
is not complicated, it takes a good deal of
time due to the size of the dam. As such,
I recommend we prioritize other locations.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Actually, I can handle it if you give me
the details. I mean, it IS my job as the
foreman of the dam and all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Very well. Remember these steps.
First, you...

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_060.text:
...And if you repeat that sequence,
everything should work out.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Woof! That's a lot more work than I
was expecting. But I'll get 'er done,
don't you worry.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Took a while, but I finally managed
to get everything restarted.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Thanks for showing me how, by the way!
Probably a good thing for me to know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Keep up your hard work, then.
Now off to the next location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_000.text:
People keep saying things are being
purified, but the pollution around here
is clearly getting WORSE, not better.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I mean, these people are all
off their nuts, right!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Exactly—and that's why we need
to ACTUALLY purify things!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_050.text:
So you're on their side,
tree-hater!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_000_CUT_000_060.text:
With that man gone,
we can restart the engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_FOREST_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Today we're gonna do some
REAL purification!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey! You there! Yes, you! Oh yes, I knew it!
Why, up close, you're even MORE beautiful!
I feel like I could get lost in your eyes... You just HAVE to be an angel, showing up
here at the very moment I'm fretting over
a new product design! May we speak?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
You would dare cast the Dismal King
as an angel? Heh. How amusing.
I shall play along for a time.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, thank you! All right, so to begin,
what is the thing you desire most? Don't tell me! Picture it in your mind.
Stronger now, think hard... Harder...
A-HA! I have it! You want a watch!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
A what? No. You are a fool.
What I seek is far more—

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Does the Trigon Corporation even have the
technology to develop a triangle engine
small enough to be worn on the wrist?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Don't underestimate us! Why, your circuits
would be scrambled if you saw what was
going on at the company's R&D facility!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text: Do not interrupt the Dismal King!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text: This is a watch? I have no need of such. Do you people truly wear these massive things on your person?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
Director! I'm working on a prototype that
utilizes a small-scale triangle engine,
but it appears it's still too large.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
The miniaturized triangle engine is a nut
countless individuals before you have
tried and failed to crack.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
We need more practical product concepts.
Try asking for Fred's opinion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Say there, Fred! So I'm trying to develop a
wristwatch that utilizes a miniature triangle
engine, but I just can't seem to get the thing
small enough. Do you have any ideas?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Miniaturizing a triangle engine is something
best left to pure geniuses like Alessa.
Sadly, she was never interested in that
kind of research.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Agreed. Dr. Alessa Sitrix's research interests
shifted away from improving the triangle engine
itself and toward the development of the
BX series—which concluded with me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
She doesn't much care about machines.
In the end, Alessa thinks about Alessa,
and that's it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
You sound as though you
know her very well.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Oh, sorry. Did it sound like that?
No, I'm afraid Alessa has passed on.
I was speaking of things in the past.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Oh, and this is merely a thought,
but what if you pursued an air purifier
instead of this wristwatch?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
The technological capabilities of the Trigon
Corporation allow us to manufacture large-
scale products with ease, you see. And if we develop products that are meant
for factories and not individuals, we can
sell them at an even higher price.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Ah, I see! So rather than trying to force the
miniaturization work, I should make use of our
existing technology on products that need it!
I think I've seen the light as an engineer.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Great. Then go work hard so you
can earn the director's approval.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text:
Thanks to you, we sold
a ton of air purifiers!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text:
And by installing them in this area,
the triangle network has been restored.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text: Then it is time to move on.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Residential and Commercial Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.text: We shall take care of it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears the triangle network repairs
are proceeding smoothly. Thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The obvious outcome once my power
was applied to the situation.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The emergence of the Anti-Triangle...
The severing of the triangle network...
The failure of triangle engines... My sister and I battled these problems
since we first came up with triangle
theory, but its value to the world
has been worth any amount of pain. Or at least, that is very much
what I want to believe...

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_030.text:
And where is this sister of yours?
I have not laid eyes upon her even once.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_040.text:
...Alessa passed away in an accident
some ten years ago.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Mmm. I suspect that is a memory
you would prefer remain in the past.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I still have a hard time believing it.
I keep thinking she'll show up one day—
she did always love her little pranks.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_070.text:
It doesn't help that the details of her
accident are maddeningly unclear. In fact,
the only witness was Fred, who was her
assistant at the time. Alessa's old laboratory is still in the
basement of the terminal, but not even
I am allowed in there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_080.text: You spoke of Fred. Tell me more.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You'd be better off talking to him.
For now, you can leave the triangle
engine in this place to me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_100.text:
You seem to have much in your past
you do not wish to revisit.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Well, Fred and I were together once.
So if I seem reluctant to discuss
the man, that's why.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I am told you were once Alessa's assistant.
Tell me of her research.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I was her assistant when she was researching
the BX series—the results of which are
standing next to you now. We wanted to apply triangle theory to AI.
Alessa had grown dissatisfied researching
triangle engines, you see, and sought to
use the theory with different applications.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Honestly, Alessa was just quick to lose interest
in things. Once a subject started going well,
she'd drop it like a hot potato and move on to
something new and exciting. Gave me a bit of whiplash as her assistant,
but that was nothing compared to the messes
her sister Corana had to clean up.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
That has nothing to do with you.
Why are you even asking?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
You are correct it has nothing to do with me.
But one's interest is naturally piqued when
a dead person may, in fact, be alive.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
You're dredging up some things I would much
sooner forget. She was so horribly disfigured
in that accident, and I just... I can't...

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I'm sorry, but my inability to handle this
is why I broke up with Corana, and I really
have no interest in discussing it further.
I'll take my leave now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I feel a deep darkness in that man.
And though I know not what he hides,
I am most eager to discover it.
You must feel the same.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Sadly, I don't possess such
intuitive patterns of thought. All I can say is that so long as the cause
and details of the accident remain unknown,
Dr. Alessa Sitrix's death cannot be confirmed
conclusively. That is all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Yet Corana hopes very much that her
sister yet lives. We should tell the
woman what we have learned.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
We should not raise false hopes by
conveying incorrect information.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I've finished repairing the laboratory's
triangle engine. Now tell me, how did
your conversation with Fred go?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
He was a deeply intriguing man.
I can see why he would have been
difficult for you to deal with.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Yes, and I felt that way even when we lived
together. Though we were partners, I never
once felt love for the man. It was more like...
Well, like I had to comfort him in Alessa's stead.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
...Forgive me. It's water under the bridge.
There are things that need doing in the here
and now, and that's what I should attend to.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_000.text:
The triangle network restoration seems
to be proceeding apace; the skies look
that much prettier.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Do you regard the skies being blanketed
with smoke as 'pretty' in this world?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_020.text:
You're an odd one, aren't you? Such things
serve as proof that life is growing richer.
Also, when I look at a sky and see only blue,
it makes me profoundly uneasy. Just look at all that smog! Doesn't it make you
feel like you're being embraced by something warm
and comforting? In this way, our engines give
not only physical happiness, but peace of mind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_030.text:
If you say so. More to the point,
I've seen the Anti-Triangle failing
to absorb energy of late.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Really? Can you give me any
more details about that?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, what about the area around it?
If the Anti-Triangle itself hasn't changed,
perhaps something in the surroundings did.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The triangle network around the
Anti-Triangle had been restored.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_080.text:
When I think on it, the fiends vanished
when they failed to draw the energy out.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_090.text:
Interesting... So if the Anti-Triangle is
caught in a triangle network, it protects
the engines and gives us an opening to
exterminate the beasts.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Your meaning is clear: Restart the
triangle engines in such a way that
the fiends are caught in the network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_LAB_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Exactly so. Oh, but this is very exciting!
Now that we understand more about the
Anti-Triangle, we might be able to prevent
it from appearing entirely.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.text: Show me your triangle engine, workman!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Get outta here! If I can't use any water
from the dam, I can't get any work done!
Now go on! Beat it! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Seems like my son's good work has led to the
restoration of the dam's triangle engine.
What a chip off the old block! Gah ha ha!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_010.text: Show me your triangle engine, workman!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Nope! I'm busy gettin' the thing up
and running again. Go on, now! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Why won't this man listen to us?
He should be concerned about the fact
his engine is no longer functioning.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Such is the nature of humanity.
It seems we're left with no options
but to make use of the man's son.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Is your father the one
in charge of the mine?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Oh no! Is he causing you trouble?
I'm so sorry.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
*sigh* I'm afraid he's always been like this.
See, my father is an incredibly competitive
man who always tries to do everything himself. This leads to a vicious circle where it
becomes harder and harder to ask for help
once he realizes he's in over his head.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
I must examine the mine's triangle engine,
but your father is a stubborn fool who
denies the authority of the Dismal King.
Speak to him, before my anger is raised.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text: Of course. I'll go there right now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text: I'm busy with work! Go on now! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Son! What brings you here?
That dam still purrin' right along?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
It's running great, but only because these
folks helped me repair the triangle engine—
and you should let them do the same here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Help!? I don't need no gosh-durned help!
Ain't nobody know this mine better'n me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
YOU might be fine with that, but what about all
the other people working here? If the triangle
engine isn't fixed soon, they won't be able
to support their families.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text: Okay, fine. What if I help you instead of some stranger?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, sure! I'd never turn down
help from m'own son.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
A'yup, I think we're ready to get things
up and running here. The process is the
same as it was at the dam, right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_1.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_1.text:
Yes, that will work fine. The engine here
is of the same antiquated construction as
the one located at the dam.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_000.text:
What of this place? Does a triangle
engine power all of this as well?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It does. Dr. Corana Sitrix is always saying
that we must also use the power of triangle
engines to make the children happy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_020.text:
An agreeable outlook. When I think of how those
children will one day grow into beings possessed
of great darkness, I can hardly contain...
Wait. Something is amiss.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Help! Heeelp! The triangle engine
is out of control and we can't shut
down any of the rides!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_050.text:
This is the first time something of this
nature has happened, and my database files
do not possess a clear solution. We might be able to stop it by absorbing the
triangle energy and inducing an overload on
the system, but with the triangle network
severed, we have no means to do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_060.text:
That would be sufficient?
Then the problem is easily solved.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_000_CUT_000_070.text:
We have but to lure in
the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Thus have we protected future darkness.
Even fiends have their uses on occasion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I will forward this data to Dr. Corana Sitrix.
The information regarding both the park's engine
running wild and its subsequent stabilization
should prove valuable research data.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh wow, you know Dr. Sitrix? When I was a kid,
she gave me a toy that was powered by triangle
energy. That's actually the whole reason I
started working here in the first place!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix's dream is blossoming
splendidly. She really should have more
confidence in what she's doing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text: You should tell her as much.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It is good to see you again, Michele.
Would you mind if I took care of
restarting the triangle engine here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Michele

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Michele here was one of Dr. Corana Sitrix's
colleagues at the laboratory—and the one she
had the greatest number of conversations with.
Clearly she was enamored with him.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_040.text:
My analysis judged you to be the most
suitable partner for Dr. Corana Sitrix.
Why did you not act on this?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Because Corana was too busy hooking up
with Fred, of all people. Why she did that
I'll never know, especially considering he
and Alessa were an item!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_060.text: Er... Right. Sorry. Back to work.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_070.text:
You should go say hello to Dr. Corana Sitrix
once in a while, Michele; while I can help her
with this kind of work, what she truly needs
is a partner with whom she can share her life.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I want to, Master—I really do.
I just... Well, I can't.
Call it a human failing, I guess.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You're as handy as ever, Master!
We got that wrapped up in no time. I'm also really glad we got to catch up.
Er, and if you don't mind, would you
tell Corana that I'm doing all right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_100.text: I will be certain to do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_PORT_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Humans are complex creatures. At times they follow
their hearts, while at others they suppress such
urges willingly. Do exceed our expectations, then,
as that would be the most interesting outcome.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The animals have escaped!
Please help me get them back!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I will take care of repairing the
triangle engine if you can help
this woman with the animals.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_000_CUT_000_040.text:
This hardly seems a task
befitting the Dismal King.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
You took enough time that I was
able to finish the repairs here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
The creatures wished to take
the long way home.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sure wish we could use triangle theory
to create a breed of animal that actually
LISTENS when you call them...

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix feels it unethical to apply
triangle theory to living creatures.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Chide her not for this. Her own lack of strength
makes the creatures untamable; if she desires a
flock that pays heed to her every beck and call,
her only recourse is to create one.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Uh... Sorry? Or thanks?
Not really sure here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hello there. I'm with the Trigon
Infrastructure Department.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text: Show me your triangle engine, drone!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Sorry, but there's a customer in the building
that houses the triangle engine, so you can't
go near it right now. They're demanding that we purge the
pollution as quickly as possible—and
between you and me, I hope it happens
soon, because they are VERY annoying.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
They're even saying that the end of days is
approaching because we aren't handling the
pollution correctly. Talk about a buzzkill!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Given this information, we should
deal with other locations first.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
A darkness most intriguing
appears to be in the offing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_010_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_010_CUT_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Industrial and Commercial Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Hello there. I'm with the Trigon
Infrastructure Department.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text: Show me your triangle engine, drone!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Oh, are you here to repair it!?
Thank the stars!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
People keep contacting us with
all these wild complaints,
and I'm just at my wits' end!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text: I will deal with it at once.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hello! I'm with the Trigon Sales Department!
Would you like to try out one of our newest
products absolutely free of charge!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Great! First of all, this is a sensor that
utilizes triangle energy to locate
places that will boost your spirit.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Even the end of days is nothing to
worry about when you have this baby!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much for your interest!
Aaand...here you go. I went ahead and
just turned it on for you there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, I hate it when people turn down
a good deal... But hey, your loss!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_BATTLE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_BATTLE_000_CUT_0.text: What awaits us now, I wonder?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.text:
My sensors are not picking up
anything at this location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.text:
Your 'sensors' are of little use.
See you not the fiend before us?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Your device put me in the path
of a great number of fiends.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yes, but you're SO much
stronger now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
That cannot be argued, nor can the fact I
enjoyed myself most heartily because of it.
You have my thanks.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Your strange product was of much use.
Keep up the fine work.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text: Oh, uh... Yeah! I will! Gosh, I've never had anyone thank me for this before. Also, this is technically something I give out as an apology, but in your case, it's for... Well, it's for thanking me, I guess!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_TRADE_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Industrial and Residential Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RECLEAN_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_RECLEAN_000_CUT_000_00.text:
We've already repaired this engine,
so restarting it is a simple matter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
That was Fred. The man seemed
quite keen to avoid prying eyes.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
He appears to be headed to the basement
level of the terminal. Perhaps he is going
to the laboratory of Dr. Alessa Sitrix
that her sister mentioned.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
I suspect this may pose an opportunity
for me to bear witness to his darkness.
After him!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
...Yes, everything is proceeding apace.
Additionally, the man we spoke of before
is proving to be quite useful.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
There's a 50 percent probability
that the person he is speaking
to is Dr. Alessa Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
As I said, there is only a 50 percent
probability. This is, however, an
assumption based on my analytics.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
People are more cautious when aware they're
being watched. We've finally drawn close to
the dark, and I will not be denied my chance.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
I cannot say for certain that he was
speaking with Dr. Alessa Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
The question of her being alive or dead is of
no consequence to me. The man is clearly hiding
something involving her, and scheming to boot.
This intrigues me a great deal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
We should share this information
with Dr. Corana Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
I'll not stop you if that is your wish,
for it does not appear she can stop
whatever plot is unfolding here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix is in the central
terminal. I do not know why.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
You know where she is despite
being so far from her?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
I am Dr. Corana Sitrix's assistant;
I must always be aware of her actions.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
And you would be aware of Alessa's
position in the same manner?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Correct. My last reading that seemingly
detected her was our first contact
since the accident.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Yet you still lack the information to make
a conclusive declaration on the matter?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Correct. However, if Dr. Corana Sitrix
has discovered something in the terminal,
we may be able to supplement said data.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text: Then what shall be our course?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
You must let me see Alessa's laboratory,
Fred; I have to know if there are any
papers on triangle theory there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
This again, Corana? All remaining data has
been released to the public through the
Trigon Corporation. There's nothing there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
But you of all people know how she was:
there might be notes or writings or
seemingly random doodles that could
turn out to be a breakthrough! Other people would simply overlook
that kind of thing, but I won't.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Look, I know I've always come across as a kind
of idiot luddite to you genius Sitrix sisters,
but Alessa's lab is owned by the Trigon
Corporation, and I'm in charge of it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
So no, Corana. You can't go in.
Now turn around and go home.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Ugh. One of these days, she's just going to
force her way in even if it means destroying
the entrance. We really need to deal with this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
This exchange has happened many times
between the two of them, and this
instance provided no new information.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, but it did. I sensed the man's panic,
and can say without question that he is
headed for darkness.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
I cannot determine whether or not
your words are true.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Something is going on here:
the terminal's energy level is rising.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text: What might we witness this time?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
So the traveler of the Conjoined Worlds has
been lured in at last. I have been trying to
ascertain if you would be a friend or foe,
but see now that you are clearly the latter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
You'll rue the day you
interfered with me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
So it was you who created
the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
She was the one sending fiends to
disrupt the triangle network, then.
Was that Alessa?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
What does that mean, robot?
Do you require more information?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
No. 50 percent of that woman is
Dr. Alessa Sitrix. The remaining
50 percent is something else.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Synthesized life! How fascinating.
I wonder what Corana would make of this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text: I do not think we should tell her.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Oh. It's you two. Look, I know there's been
a lot of work recently, what with all the
various problems cropping up, but please
continue the repairs as fast as you can.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Do they truly think this is enough
to stop the Dismal King?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text: Let us make for the terminal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text: It's been a long time, Master.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
You created the Anti-Triangle and
attempted to hinder the completion
of the triangle network. Explain.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
You think you know much, traveler,
but you know nothing. The Anti-Triangle is a natural formation
caused by triangle energy. I was merely using
them to make the true dangers of the triangle
network known to Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Oh, triangle theory itself is perfectly safe.
Unexpected things happen, however, when
energy is amplified through a triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
I do not know—hence the danger.
It's entirely unpredictable.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
I see. Well, given the opportunity
that presents, I hope something
truly spectacular occurs!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
All the triangle engines
are repaired.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix is headed for the central
terminal, where it appears they are planning
to hold a ceremony.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yes. The energy level near the
central terminal is spiking.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
At long last! Oh, how I eagerly await
seeing what darkness might be in store!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Is this some manner of ceremony?
Good. I have no doubt fascinating
events are about to play out.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The director of the Trigon Corporation
informed me about an important ceremony
I had to attend. That's all I know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Greetings, ladies and gentlemen! Today is a
momentous day in our history: every triangle
engine is now functioning, which means the
triangle network is complete! Yes, this is a day of new beginnings—
not only for all of you, but also for
everyone who could not be with us today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Now, let us beckon the Supreme Being unto us.
I daresay none among you will be unfamiliar
with her name...Doctor Alessa Sitrix!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Greetings, everyone. Let me begin with this:
I'm aware that many of you believed I was
killed in a tragic accident—and in reality,
that is not far from the truth. But thanks to the energy generated
by the triangle network, I have
been able to return to this world.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Henceforth, I will be resuming the work that
was interrupted by my accident—the work of
applying triangle theory to living creatures. I will offer up my body as a test subject
once more. But this time, we have more than
sufficient amounts of triangle energy,
which means I cannot fail.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
In a moment, I will stand upon this stage as a
new form of life: the Supreme Being. And once
this is done, all of you will be transmuted
into triangle energy and become one with me. Please know it will be the great honor
of my life to guide you all in this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Have you gone utterly mad, Alessa!?
That's not what triangle theory is for! What about all the times we talked about
using it to help people!? To be of service
so they could live happier lives!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh, my dear little sister. You have my thanks
for continuing our research after the accident—
for had you and I not completed the triangle
network, I wouldn't be standing here today. But this is a happy moment, Corana!
You are about to become a part of
the Supreme Being—a part of ME.
Does this not fill you with joy?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
So this is why your Trigon Corporation exists.
And at long last, your dearest hope is about
to become reality!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_110.text:
All that the Trigon Corporation does
is for the sake of the great Alessa—
and we offer our all unto her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_120.text: You knew I was not of this world.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_130.text:
All is as Alessa foresaw, for she said
you would be the last piece of the puzzle. Oh yes! She is my goddess, and I seek
nothing more in this life than to be
of service to her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_140.text:
My power has guided you to darkness,
yet all of you possessed the makings
for it long before my arrival. Because of that, my journey in this
world has been a most enjoyable one.
You have my thanks.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_150.text:
I saw how you were guided by the emerald light,
traveler, and knew it would lead you here.
Thus was I assured of my destiny, for your
arrival is the key to advancing these events.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Fascinating. Alas, the Dismal King is already
the supreme being. I had the measure of you
the moment you revealed you sought others,
and now, I have had enough.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I wish we never saw the Vermillion Bird mural...
I wish we hadn't researched triangle theory...
I wish I'd gone on that date with Michele... I wish I'd never reached out to Fred...
I wish I had never been Alessa's sister...

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_180.text:
I should like to listen to more of your darkness,
but I lack the time for it. Now then, would you
prefer to become one with your sister and have
your life ended? You there! Heed the Dismal King!
Would you prefer to become one with
your sister and... Bah! Useless.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_190.text:
I presume you are able to contact
the various individuals in charge
of triangle engines, robot?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Yes, I can open a line to all
of them simultaneously.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Then take the woman and see that they
are cut off. I will deal with this one.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_220.text:
How can you just move forward
like this!? I just... I...

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_000_230.text:
A king is a being of ultimate perfection.
His subjects, however, are not—which is why
it falls to the regent to protect them. If his subjects say they cannot move on, 
the king's duty is to create a way forward.
So as you do your work. I must do mine.
Now away with you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
We had a dream when we saw the Vermillion
Bird, Corana... And though it didn't come
true today, maybe someday...it...

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_010.text:
I'm going to divide the network into clusters.
This will prevent triangle energy from becoming
concentrated in one place, as each cluster will
complement the others and keep things in check.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Which means you may never
see your sister again.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_030.text:
I am a scientist.
I prioritize data over emotion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_040.text: If that is what you have chosen.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_060.text: Let me help you, Corana. Please.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_070.text:
Michele? Of course you can help!
And, um... Thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_080.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_080.text:
And the fascinating beings you seek?
Have you found them already?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_090.text:
I have indeed found an individual that
is suitable for becoming a part of me.
Again, the emerald line was my guide.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_100.text:
It is difficult to reconcile a green line that only
you can see. But your words are persuasive,
so I will choose to believe you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_110.text:
It is time to depart this land, then.
Ah, but tell me: What is the name
of this place?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_120.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_000_CUT_030_120.text:
This world is known as Vermiglio.
I do not know what it means.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_020.text:
This is a ceremony for you, Dr. Sitrix,
so I hope you enjoy yourself. That said,
why are you mingling with one of our
employees? Looking for a new assistant?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Now then, Dr. Alessa Sitrix will be arriving
momentarily, and I suspect it will be a moving
reunion of sisters long-parted. As such, I'll
give you a little time to say your goodbyes.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, my dear little sister. You have my thanks
for continuing our research after the accident—
for had you not gone and completed the triangle
network, I wouldn't be standing here today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_070.text:
I don't understand. Are you...Alessa?
I mean, I'm happy you're alive—truly I am—
but I'm also very confused. What's going on,
and what did she mean by 'saying goodbyes'?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_080.text:
I fear your sister's role ends here.
With the triangle network completed,
I need her to die for real this time.
...Fred? If you would?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_090.text:
Fred, no! The director betrayed me!
She intends to keep all this power
for herself! Get rid of her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, now THIS is rich! Two beautiful—yet
utterly terrifying—women have made the
same request of me! Must be my punishment
for being so darned handsome.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, Corana, my former flame. Though you're
rather plain, you're smart as a whip—so I trust
you to make a cool-headed choice here. Who should I choose: the director
or your sister? Who dies?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_120.text: Don't even joke about that, Fred!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Ah ah ah! I know what you're trying to say.
Or rather, I knew what you were going to say
without you even saying it. Alessa may have foisted cleaning up
her research onto me, but she IS
your only sister, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Which makes it an obvious choice.
Sorry, Director—I guess you die.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_150.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_150.text:
You damn, useless drunk! Apparently you
didn't believe me when I said there was
no seat at the table for those who
weren't of use! But so be it. If you can't deal with
Alessa, I'll just do it myself.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_160.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_160.text:
Hey, you're the one who handed out the
death sentence. And on that note... Bye!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_170.text:
Well, would you look at that?
I'm the director of Trigon now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_180.text:
The director is dead, but the plan moves on.
Concentrate the energy from the triangle
network into the central terminal, Fred.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_190.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_190.text:
That's 'Director,' not 'Fred.' Also,
you don't order me around anymore,
Alessa. The director decides what we're
doing here—and oh gosh, that's ME!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_200.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_200.text:
Your eternal life project has, of course,
been canceled. Instead, we'll make a charm
filled with triangle energy and sell it to
customers who crave perpetual youth. And of course, it'll make me RICH!
RICH, I tell ya!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_210.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_210.text: I knew you were useless as an assistant, but I never realized you were so stupid.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_220.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_220.text:
Well, well! Looks like this day just
earned itself another death sentence! Still, just murdering you outright would be
so BORING, so perhaps I'll try to extract
a little triangle energy out of it!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_240.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_240.text:
Dear me, I wonder how long you'll be able to
maintain that form? I mean, you SHOULD show
your sister how brutally disfigured you were 
after the failed experiment, right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_260.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_260.text:
You used triangle theory to evolve yourself
once you saw the success of the BX series.
Sadly, living creatures aren't machines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_280.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_280.text: It is vanishingly rare to come across someone as utterly and absolutely human as you. You do not disappoint—indeed, I rather like you. So come with the Dismal King. Become a part of me, that you might become even more fascinating.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_290.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_290.text:
Well that's...creepy. Look, just hurry up,
do whatever it is you came here for,
and then be on your way, okay? Oh, and I have a VERY fun date
planned with the Sitrix sisters here,
so I'd advise you not to get in the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_330.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_330.text:
I understand: you wish to throw away
your life, become a soul, and then be
one with me. I shall grant your wish.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_340.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_340.text:
A wise choice.
Oh, and take BX10 with you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_370.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_000_370.text:
...Is that would you thought I'd say?
Ah ha ha! You fell for my stalling technique!
Much like Alessa, I have evolved—and now
my triangle energy is at its full potential!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_000.text: You yet draw breath? How stubborn.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Wait! I... I was drunk? Yes, that's it!
Just a little drunken prank!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_020.text:
To think you were so fascinating but a
short while ago. Alas, you bore me
now—so begone with you!

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_040.text:
Alessa, why didn't you tell me you were alive?
I don't care what you look like, because you'll
ALWAYS be my sister. So let's try to find a way
to get you back to normal—together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_050.text:
You don't have to console me, Corana.
Triangle theory isn't magic—that which has
been broken can't be put back how it was.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_060.text:
But there MUST be a way, Alessa.
Don't give up—we'll find it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I always did tend to give up on things...
But all right, Corana. If you think this
can be done, I'll follow your lead.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_080.text:
This is the first time you've taken my advice since we
went to the cave mural! I wish you'd tried listening to
me a lot earlier, but I suppose this will have to do.
Let's see the Vermillion Bird together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_090.text:
The greatest sisters in the land
are back in action once more.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_010_CUT_010_110.text:
I have indeed found an individual that
is suitable for becoming a part of me.
Again, the emerald line was my guide.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, if it isn't Dr. Sitrix and
our otherworldly traveler! Sorry I confused you for an employee before, but
I'm SO impressed by how helpful you've been since
you came here—we were at quite the loss for how
to deal with Alessa's Anti-Triangle creatures.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, I suppose it won't hurt to reveal
my entire clever plan now that the
triangle network is complete...

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The Trigon Corporation was created to raise the
funds required to complete the triangle network—
and I cannot tell you how proud I was when
Alessa selected me to lead her new company.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_060.text:
But as we approached our goal, Alessa suddenly
wanted to stop the project. Of course, that
would have caused Trigon to collapse—and as
its director, I could not permit such a thing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Hold on. Alessa died in an accident
shortly after the project started.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh no, Alessa is very much alive;
her 'death' was something she
and Fred came up with. Don't get me wrong—there WAS an accident.
But it didn't kill Alessa.
It just...changed her.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Details, details! Look, I'm not an expert
in triangle theory, so if you want any
actual technical answers, you'll need to
go straight to your sister. All I know is this: Alessa wanted to complete
the triangle network in order to get her
original body back, and Trigon was happy
to help her achieve that goal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_110.text:
And then? Poof! Her sudden change of heart.
But I don't need to tell YOU about that;
I'm sure you've found yourself tossed about
on the stormy seas of her whims before. Regardless, it was too much to ask—the
livelihoods of Trigon's entire staff
hung in the balance, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_120.text:
So we simply ignored her and went ahead
with the plan—but then she started to
fight back with the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_140.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_SIUG_BOSS_020_CUT_000_140.text:
